availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Shelby County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Mary "Polly" Young. Father of Armstrong Young, William Young, Elizabeth Young, and Mary Young. Farmer in Shelby County, Kentucky, in 1850. Owned six enslaved persons in Shelby County in 1850. Farmer in Shelby County in 1860. Owned four enslaved persons in Shelby County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Shelby County, District No. 2, p. 348A.
